value.title: Leveraging OneLake Explorer - The OneDrive of Data! (Microsoft Fabric)
value.excerpt: It's been said that OneLake is the OneDrive of data in Microsoft Fabric! OneLake Explorer makes that even more so. Patrick walks you through how this works and how you can leverage it today!  OneLake File Explorer https://learn.microsoft.com/fabric/onelake/onelake-file-explorer  游닉 Become a member: https://guyinacu.be/membership

value.title: Native Query: Be careful when using in Power BI

value.title: Why can't I use Microsoft Fabric?
value.excerpt: You've heard about all the great things with Microsoft Fabric, but you don't see it in the portal. You only see the Power BI items and no persona switcher. What's going on? Adam shows you to enable Fabric for your tenant.  Enable Microsoft Fabric for your organization https://learn.microsoft.com/fabric/admin/fabric-switch
